translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

Finding the police of Jaguarão besieged by the rebels, it is fitting that Your Excellency, Sir of the 1st Battalion of Fusiliers; the first to arrive may Your Excellency

God keep Your Excellency Passo da Maria Gomes, June 23, 1844. Most Illustrious Sir Luís José Ferreira. Lieutenant Colonel Commander of the Garrison of Pelotas. Francisco Pedro de Abreu.

The infantry must remain in Jaguarão until further orders or until the troops who are to relieve them arrive.
